Description:
CAMPAIGNER: You disapprove of the Seven. Why? Because they lost?
ADVENTURESS: Of course not! Because they fled. They were always less than they seemed.
CAMPAIGNER: Have you no empathy?
ADVENTURESS: Stop chasing this dream. 
CAMPAIGNER: That is easy for you to say. 
ADVENTURESS: No. It is the hardest thing I have had to learn.
Name: Overheard at Zee: Unwanted questions
